synonyms.synonym: Exchange factor found in platelets and leukemic and neuronal tissues

protein.general_function: Involved in Rho guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Acts as guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) for RhoA and RhoB GTPases

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of rho protein signal transduction

reference.reference_text: Thiesen S, Kubart S, Ropers HH, Nothwang HG: Isolation of two novel human RhoGEFs, ARHGEF3 and ARHGEF4, in 3p13-21 and 2q22. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2000 Jun 24;273(1):364-9.
